name: Splinter Zone
description: Run, jump and shoot everything that stands in your way. Then you die and try again. Maybe a bit more wiser about what challenges lie ahead, maybe with an idea on how to escape this situation, or maybe not.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any processor from the past five years should be good... Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any processor from the past five years should be good... Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad recommended
